imdb.plot outline: Hosted by Lindsay Cameron Wilson, Love Food is a show that celebrates food, family and community. Lindsay's recipes are like a patchwork quilt of life. "It's never just about the recipe. Cooking is the story of your neighborhood, your friends, your family, your travels and the ingredients you use, all woven together to tell a story - a food love story.
imdb.title: Love Food
plot: Hosted by Lindsay Cameron Wilson, _Love Food_ (qv) is a show that celebrates food, family and community. Lindsay's recipes are like a patchwork quilt of life. "It's never just about the recipe. Cooking is the story of your neighborhood, your friends, your family, your travels and the ingredients you use, all woven together to tell a story - a food love story.
